official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to prohibit foreign air carriers from paying substandard wages to domestic ground crews.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to direct the Civil Aeronautics Board to suspend or terminate the permit of any foreign air carrier which pays substandard wages to domestic ground crews.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to prohibit foreign air carriers from paying substandard wages to domestic ground crews.
